mapper.insert: insert into restaurant ( name, address, owner_email, information, phone_number, open_time, close_time, category ) values ( #{name}, #{address}, #{ownerEmail}, #{information}, #{phoneNumber}, #{openTime}, #{closeTime}, #{category} )
mapper.update: update restaurant set name = #{name}, address = #{address}, information = #{information}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber}, open_time = #{openTime}, close_time = #{closeTime}, category = #{category} where id = #{id}
